title: health api service and database connectivity check
description: Test the /health GET endpoint to verify it returns 200 when the service and database are healthy, and 503 when unhealthy.

title: studies api create update delete with uniqueness and deletion protection
description: Test /api/v1/studies POST, PUT, DELETE endpoints to ensure study label uniqueness is enforced, deletion is blocked if dependent database releases exist, and appropriate status codes and messages are returned.

title: database releases api create update delete with study scoping and deletion protection
description: Test /api/v1/database-releases POST, PUT, DELETE endpoints to verify releases are scoped to studies, label uniqueness per study is enforced, deletion is blocked if reporting efforts exist, and correct error handling is implemented.

title: reporting efforts api create update delete with study and release linkage validation
description: Test /api/v1/reporting-efforts POST, PUT, DELETE endpoints to ensure reporting efforts are correctly linked to studies and database releases, foreign key mismatches are rejected, and proper status codes are returned.

title: text elements api create update search with duplicate prevention
description: Test /api/v1/text-elements POST, PUT, GET, and /api/v1/text-elements/search GET endpoints to verify duplicate prevention logic (case and space insensitive), type filtering, and search functionality work as expected.

title: packages api create update delete with unique name and item dependency checks
description: Test /api/v1/packages POST, PUT, DELETE endpoints to ensure package names are unique, deletion is blocked if dependent items exist, and appropriate error responses are returned.

title: package items api create update delete with composite key uniqueness and reference validation
description: Test /api/v1/packages/{package_id}/items POST and /api/v1/packages/items/{item_id} PUT, DELETE endpoints to verify composite key uniqueness, required references to package and study, and correct error handling.

title: websocket endpoint real time updates and initial snapshot
description: Test /api/v1/ws/studies WebSocket endpoint to confirm it upgrades connection, provides initial snapshot of studies, and broadcasts real-time create, update, and delete events correctly.
